tickets.title: Implement User Authentication
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to be able to log in to the application so that I can access my personalized dashboard.

The authentication system should:
- Support email/password login
- Integrate with OAuth 2.0 providers (Google, GitHub)
- Implement secure session management
- Support multi-factor authentication (MFA)

Technical Requirements:
- Use JWT tokens for session management
- Implement rate limiting on login attempts
- Log all authentication events for audit
tickets.acceptance_criteria:
Given a user with valid credentials
When they submit the login form
Then they should be authenticated and redirected to dashboard

Given a user with invalid credentials
When they submit the login form
Then they should see an error message

Given a user with MFA enabled
When they enter correct password
Then they should be prompted for MFA code

tickets.title: Create User Profile Page
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to view and edit my profile information so that I can keep my account details up to date.

Features:
- Display user information (name, email, avatar)
- Allow editing of profile fields
- Support avatar upload
- Show account activity history
tickets.acceptance_criteria:
Given an authenticated user
When they navigate to /profile
Then they should see their profile information

Given a user editing their profile
When they save changes
Then the changes should be persisted

tickets.title: Implement API Rate Limiting
tickets.description:
As a system administrator, I want to implement rate limiting on API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage.

Requirements:
- Limit requests per IP address
- Limit requests per authenticated user
- Return appropriate 429 status codes
- Include rate limit headers in responses

Configuration:
- Default: 100 requests per minute
- Authenticated users: 1000 requests per minute
- Admin users: unlimited
tickets.acceptance_criteria:
Given an unauthenticated user
When they exceed 100 requests per minute
Then they should receive a 429 response

Given rate limit headers
When any request is made
Then X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining headers should be present

tickets.title: Add Search Functionality
tickets.description:
As a user, I want to search for content across the application so that I can quickly find what I'm looking for.

Search should support:
- Full-text search across documents
- Filtering by type, date, author
- Sorting by relevance, date
- Pagination of results
- Search suggestions/autocomplete
tickets.acceptance_criteria:
Given a search query
When the user submits the search
Then relevant results should be displayed

Given search results
When the user applies filters
Then results should be filtered accordingly

tickets.title: Fix Memory Leak in WebSocket Handler
tickets.description:
There is a memory leak in the WebSocket connection handler that causes the server to run out of memory after extended use.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open multiple WebSocket connections
2. Send messages for 30+ minutes
3. Observe memory usage increasing

Expected: Memory should remain stable
Actual: Memory grows continuously
tickets.acceptance_criteria:
Given multiple WebSocket connections
When running for extended periods
Then memory usage should remain stable

Given a closed WebSocket connection
When the connection is terminated
Then all associated resources should be freed

metadata.purpose: Sample data for AI SDLC Agent development and testing
